propertyDefinition.name: RegulationError
propertyDefinition.description: Indicates if there is a regulation error

propertyDefinition.name: RequestedState
propertyDefinition.description: Set the requested state for the BCREU

propertyDefinition.name: WatchdogPeriodInMillisecond
propertyDefinition.description: Set the watchdog period for the BCREU in millisecond

propertyDefinition.name: RequestedMaxBeamCurrent
propertyDefinition.description: Set the requested max beam current for the BCREU (32767 -> 500 nA)

propertyDefinition.name: FeedbackMaxBeamCurrent
propertyDefinition.description: Feedback of the max beam current for the BCREU (32767 -> 500 nA)

propertyDefinition.name: RequestedTcsHardwire
propertyDefinition.description: Set it to 0 to enable modbus access to the BCREU. Set it to 1 to disable it

propertyDefinition.name: RunningState
propertyDefinition.description: Current state of the BCREU (1 = IDLE, 3 = START LOOKUP, 8 = LOOKUP FAILED...)

propertyDefinition.name: Status
propertyDefinition.description: Current status of the BCREU ("SYSTEM_DSP_STATUSWORD" register)

propertyDefinition.name: DspHealthStatus
propertyDefinition.description: Health status of the BCREU ("SYSTEM_DSP_HEALTHWORD" register)

propertyDefinition.name: DisplayedMaxBeamCurrent
propertyDefinition.description: Max beam current displayed on the BCREU multiplied by 10

propertyDefinition.name: DisplayedIcCyclo
propertyDefinition.description: Ic cyclo displayed on the BCREU multiplied by 10
